item.description: A casual get together for drinks, some food and fun times. Meet new, interesting and friendly people who live/work in the Metro West area. Event is free, just pay for your own drink/food.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the bar area, then may move to the dining room. Please call Catherine at 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding our group.
item.why: Join us for drinks, some food and fun times. The Aegean has a great atmosphere, good drinks and really good food! Relax and get to know some new, fun, friendly people.
item.name: Meet up for drinks and good times
